summary: TIMP RECALL, WAS REPAIRED JAN 2015.  TODAY VEHICLE STALLED IN TRAFFIC, COMPLETELY SHUT DOWN AND LOST POWER STEERING, WHILE MAKING A LEFT HAND TURN.  I AM LUCKY I WAS NOT IN AN ACCIDENT.  I WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE.  I HAVE MADE AN APPOINTMENT WITH THE DEALER, BUT SINCE IT WAS REPAIRED PREVIOUSLY, NOT SURE WHAT THEY WILL DO FOR ME. OBVIOUSLY THERE IS STILL A PROBLEM THE RECALL DID NOT REPAIR.
